titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 417) to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reform the financing of campaigns for elections for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Campbell. Petition No: 106-2.

bill.summary: 3/23/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 417 (campaign financing).
